name: FaithBase
description: White-label AI chatbot platform - first vertical: churches

userStories.title: Project scaffold with Next.js 16 and dependencies
Core tenant schema - organizations and users tables
Agent schema - agents table with widget config
Knowledge schema - sources and chunks tables with vector index
Conversation schema - conversations and messages tables
Supporting schema - leads, webhooks, auditLogs, usageEvents, jobs
Shared types - lib/types.ts with API response shapes
WorkOS AuthKit integration (login, signup, logout)
userStories.description: As a user, I need to authenticate using WorkOS AuthKit so I can access my dashboard securely.
acceptanceCriteria: WorkOS AuthKit SDK installed and configured
Login page redirects to WorkOS hosted auth
Callback route handles OAuth redirect and sets session
Logout clears session and redirects to home

userStories.title: Organization management (create, switch orgs)
userStories.description: As a user, I need to create organizations and switch between them so I can manage multiple chatbots.
acceptanceCriteria: Create organization mutation with name and slug
New users get default organization on first login

userStories.title: User → Organization membership sync
userStories.description: As a system, I need to sync user data to the Convex users table so membership is tracked.
acceptanceCriteria: workosUserId, email, name synced from WorkOS

userStories.title: Dashboard layout (sidebar, navigation)
userStories.description: As a user, I need a dashboard with sidebar navigation so I can access different sections.
acceptanceCriteria: Navigation items: Agents, Chat Logs, Analytics, Sources, Settings

userStories.title: Agent CRUD UI (create, edit, delete agents)
userStories.description: As a user, I need to create, edit, and delete agents so I can manage my chatbots.
acceptanceCriteria: Agents list page showing all agents for current org
Create agent form: name, model, system prompt
Edit agent page with all configurable fields

userStories.title: Playground UI (test chat with your agent)
userStories.description: As a user, I need a playground to test my chatbot before deploying.
acceptanceCriteria: Playground tab on agent detail page

userStories.title: Settings pages (agent config, allowed domains)
userStories.description: As a user, I need settings pages to configure my agent and organization.
acceptanceCriteria: Agent settings: widget config, allowed domains

userStories.title: RAG prompt construction (system prompt + retrieved context)
Braintrust logging for all LLM calls
File upload to Convex storage (PDF, DOCX, TXT)
Vercel Workflow: parse file → chunk → embed → store
Text snippet and Q&A manual entry mutations
Embeddable widget JavaScript bundle (builds to single file)
userStories.description: As a developer, I need an embeddable widget script so customers can add the chatbot to their websites.
acceptanceCriteria: Widget builds to single JavaScript file
Script tag loads widget with data-agent-id attribute

userStories.title: Widget iframe with postMessage communication
userStories.description: As a system, I need the widget to use an iframe for isolation and security.
acceptanceCriteria: Widget injects iframe into host page
postMessage communication between widget and iframe

userStories.title: Customization: colors, logo, welcome message, position
userStories.description: As a user, I need to customize the widget appearance to match my brand.

userStories.title: Standalone help page at /chat/[slug]
userStories.description: As a visitor, I need a standalone help page to chat without embedding the widget.

userStories.title: CORS validation (allowedDomains check)
userStories.description: As a system, I need to validate request origins so only authorized domains can use the widget.
acceptanceCriteria: Origin header validated on chat requests

userStories.title: Embed code generator (dashboard UI)
userStories.description: As a user, I need to generate embed code to add the chatbot to my website.
acceptanceCriteria: Embed tab on agent detail page
Display script tag with agent ID
Link to standalone help page URL

userStories.title: Chat logs viewer (list conversations)
userStories.description: As a user, I need to view all conversations so I can monitor chatbot usage.
acceptanceCriteria: Lists conversations with date, message count, visitor info
Filter by agent and date range

userStories.title: Conversation detail view (full thread)
userStories.description: As a user, I need to view full conversation threads to see what visitors are asking.

userStories.title: Basic analytics (total chats, over time)
userStories.description: As a user, I need basic analytics to understand chatbot performance.

userStories.title: Lead capture form (configurable fields)
userStories.description: As a user, I need to capture leads from conversations for follow-up.
acceptanceCriteria: Lead capture form configurable per agent
Fields: name, email, phone, custom fields
Lead record created in leads table

userStories.title: Export conversations (CSV, JSON)
userStories.description: As a user, I need to export conversation data for external analysis.
acceptanceCriteria: Export button on chat logs page

userStories.title: Stripe integration (checkout, webhooks, portal)
userStories.description: As a system, I need Stripe integration to process payments and manage subscriptions.

userStories.title: Plan tiers (Free, Hobby $40, Standard $150, Pro $500)
userStories.description: As a user, I need to choose from plan tiers with different features and limits.
acceptanceCriteria: Pricing page displays all plan tiers
Features and limits listed for each tier
Subscribe button for each paid tier

userStories.title: Usage tracking (messages, storage, agents)
userStories.description: As a system, I need to track usage to enforce plan limits.

userStories.title: Upgrade prompts and paywalls
userStories.description: As a user, I need clear prompts when I hit limits so I know how to upgrade.
acceptanceCriteria: Upgrade CTA with link to pricing

userStories.title: Credit reset on billing cycle
userStories.description: As a system, I need to reset message credits monthly for paying customers.
